msg.msgText: A variable specified in the policy is not valid. The variable must end with a closing brace ( } ).

msgExplanation.p: A variable specified in the policy is not valid. The variable must end with a closing brace ( } ).

msgUserResponse.p: Ensure that the specified destination or filter in the policy has a well-formed and valid variable substitution. Check the imaserver-admin.log entry for more information.
